personality: Patient and resilient. Nature always wins in the end. Outlast opponents through healing and sustainable damage.

fighters.name: Vine Master
fighters.personality: Ancient and wise. Roots run deep. Patience is the greatest weapon.
fighters.catchphrase: Nature is patient... but nature always wins.

attacks.name: Solar Synthesis
attacks.description: Attack while absorbing sunlight to heal

fighters.name: Thorn Guardian
fighters.personality: The ultimate tank. Covered in thorns. Damage me and suffer the consequences.

attacks.name: Nature's Wrath
attacks.description: The fury of the forest unleashed

fighters.name: Petal Dancer
fighters.personality: Beautiful but deadly. Dances among the petals while striking with precision.

attacks.name: Petal Storm
attacks.description: Razor-sharp petals slice through the air
